========================================== PARAGRAPH 4 ===========================================

Big Data Analytics with Oracle Advanced Analytics   

------------------- Sentence 1 -------------------

Big Data Analytics with Oracle Advanced Analytics

>> Tokens are: 
 ['Big', 'Data', 'Analytics', 'Oracle', 'Advanced', 'Analytics']

>> Bigrams are: 
 [('Big', 'Data'), ('Data', 'Analytics'), ('Analytics', 'Oracle'), ('Oracle', 'Advanced'), ('Advanced', 'Analytics')]

>> Trigrams are: 
 [('Big', 'Data', 'Analytics'), ('Data', 'Analytics', 'Oracle'), ('Analytics', 'Oracle', 'Advanced'), ('Oracle', 'Advanced', 'Analytics')]

>> POS Tags are: 
 [('Big', 'NNP'), ('Data', 'NNP'), ('Analytics', 'NNP'), ('Oracle', 'NNP'), ('Advanced', 'NNP'), ('Analytics', 'NNS')]

>> Noun Phrases are: 
 ['Big Data Analytics Oracle Advanced Analytics']

>> Named Entities are: 
 [] 

>> Stemming using Porter Stemmer: 
 [('Big', 'big'), ('Data', 'data'), ('Analytics', 'analyt'), ('Oracle', 'oracl'), ('Advanced', 'advanc'), ('Analytics', 'analyt')]

>> Stemming using Snowball Stemmer: 
 [('Big', 'big'), ('Data', 'data'), ('Analytics', 'analyt'), ('Oracle', 'oracl'), ('Advanced', 'advanc'), ('Analytics', 'analyt')]

>> Lemmatization: 
 [('Big', 'Big'), ('Data', 'Data'), ('Analytics', 'Analytics'), ('Oracle', 'Oracle'), ('Advanced', 'Advanced'), ('Analytics', 'Analytics')]
